title: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
description: Herby quinoa with cucumber, tomatoes, olives, and feta.
steps: Rinse quinoa, then simmer with broth until fluffy. Cool slightly.
Whisk olive oil, lemon, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Toss quinoa with vegetables, olives, feta, and parsley.
Drizzle dressing over salad and toss. Chill or serve room temp.

title: Weeknight Chicken Tacos
description: Citrus-marinated chicken with crunchy slaw and salsa.
steps: Marinate chicken with spices, lime juice, salt, and pepper for 10 minutes.
Sear chicken in a hot skillet until browned and cooked through.
Warm tortillas, then layer chicken, cabbage, salsa, and sour cream.
Finish with cilantro and a squeeze of lime.

title: Sheet Pan Lemon Salmon
description: Roasted salmon with broccoli and potatoes on one pan.
steps: Heat oven to 400°F (200°C). Toss potatoes with oil, salt, and pepper; roast 15 minutes.
Whisk remaining oil with garlic, mustard, and pepper. Add broccoli and salmon to pan.
Brush salmon with mixture, top with lemon slices, and roast 12-14 minutes until flaky.
Broil 1-2 minutes for extra color if desired.

title: Veggie Ginger Stir-Fry
description: Colorful veggies in a light ginger garlic sauce.
ingredients: 1 tsp cornstarch mixed with 2 tbsp water
steps: Stir-fry garlic and ginger in a hot pan with a little oil until fragrant.
Add vegetables and cook 4-5 minutes until crisp-tender.
Stir in soy sauce, vinegar, and sesame oil. Pour in cornstarch slurry to thicken.
